roleset.name: destruction
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, devastate.01. Corresponds to VNcls destroy-44, amuse-31.1

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: New York Times spins the economic devastation of the young as a "choice"

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Its devastation of cities and towns along the eastern shoreline is extensive enough to be seen by satellite.
example.arg: of cities and towns along the eastern shoreline
